name: MSPAINTformer
description:
(NG VERSION HERE: https://www.newgrounds.com/projects/games/1820850/)

This was a little crude game I made to break away from my main project for a bit. Since this game was made in a day in the messiest way possible, it might be very glitchy. I might not fix the bugs, but please report them to me, thanks!

Boss Music is a remix of Unreal Superhero 3 by Kenet and Rez

Level 1 music by yours truly :)

Controls (Keyboard):

Z - Shoot/Interact/Restart

X - Jump

Arrow Keys - Movement

Controls (Mobile):

Shoot button - Shoot/Interact/Restart

Up Arrow - Jump

Left/Right Arrows- Movement
